metadata.task_description: Create a new project with name 'Galactus', priority 'High', set start date to today, and target date to 2 weeks from now. Add summary 'Project management system for cosmic scale applications'

judgement.reasoning: The agent successfully completed the task of creating a new project named 'Galactus' on Linear.app. It correctly set the project name, summary, and priority ('High'). It accurately calculated and set the start date to 'today' (Nov 23) and the target date to '2 weeks from now' (Dec 7). The trajectory was logical and efficient, navigating to the projects section, opening the creation modal, filling out all required fields, and submitting the form. The final screenshot confirms the project 'Galactus' was created with the correct target date. The requirement for taking screenshots at every major UI state change was also met.
